category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 27 (Facility Safety and Health Inspection)
contents: Article 27 (Facility Safety and Health Inspection) ① The chairman must conduct regular safety and health inspections to detect workplace risk factors early, prevent accidents and disasters in the workplace, and ensure the safety and health of citizens using industrial complex facilities. . Revised December 22, 2021., ② When conducting an inspection pursuant to paragraph 1, the chairman of the board shall collect opinions from workers, review the problems presented, and make improvements., ③ The head of the department that operates the office facility must conduct a safety and health inspection. A detailed plan regarding the cycle and method must be established and operated.
